# app/models/current.rb 
 class Current < ActiveSupport::CurrentAttributes 
  attribute :owner, :user, :landlord 
 attribute :request_id, :user_agent, :ip_address
 
  # 
 # Set current user
   #
 

  # @param [User] user for current class
   #
   def user=(user)
 
    super 

    self.owner = user.owner
   end 

end
